column5: We welcome a new member to our Ugliboys clan.  Weighing in at just over 7lb 1oz at 2:02 in the morning Congrats to Rob D and family. Tervetuloa my little  Freya
Congatulations to Rob and Family... You to Bruce  more to break a foot over
Aguri. They just keep pumping them out down your way Bruce. I'm only charging 5 grand these days to stand up as Godfather. OFC discount is 100% off going rate.
Auguri Bruce, have one coming our way too in May. Ihave 4 amazing daughter all a,dried and they 2.5 kids each for a total of 9.
Just need 6 more and I can field a team to rival Juventus.
Bruce they cost a lot now, never mind starting a ball team! We were with all eight last night and it was NONSTOP havoc. And they see each other often! BTW the oldest is 8 youngest is three!
